:::Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian:::

::They were just as wasted as Drillbit, but unlike him, had no good memories 
to back them up. They stumbled into their rooms and collapsed onto their 
beds, totally unconsious::

--part1_bc.f69b76d.27a08ecb_boundary
